events.title: Investment Workshop for Young Adults
events.description: Join us for an interactive workshop on investment basics, featuring practical exercises and real-world examples.
events.speaker: Sarah Chen, Investment Advisor

events.title: Budget Bootcamp
events.description: Intensive hands-on session to create and optimize your personal budget.
events.speaker: Michael Rodriguez, Financial Planner

events.title: Understanding Credit & Debt
events.description: Learn about credit scores, responsible borrowing, and debt management strategies.
events.speaker: Lisa Thompson, Credit Counselor

events.title: Stock Market Simulation Challenge
events.description: Put your investment knowledge to the test in our monthly stock market simulation challenge.

events.title: Setting Financial Goals Workshop
events.description: Learn how to set and achieve meaningful financial goals for your future.
events.speaker: David Park, Financial Coach
